about.title: 2D and 3D Animation
about.content: With our create handmade characters. Our 2D and 3D animation services are customizable based on unique requirements.

about.title: Concept of Art
about.content: From the most basic and simple ideas and designs, we are helping to create the main characters or the support characters.

about.title: Modelling and Rigging
about.content: expert animators create characters right from scratch to define the facial as well as physical features with great detailing.

testimonial.name: Our Character Animation Process
testimonial.comment: When you get in touch with us, we communicate with you to understand your requirements, the pricing, and an estimated timeframe that it would take for the completion and project delivery.

testimonial.name: Our Character Animation Process
testimonial.comment: After understanding your requirements and coming up with a proper plan of action, we receive any drafts or materials that you have via a secure FTP channel.

testimonial.name: Our Character Animation Process
testimonial.comment: We then appoint a project manager for your project and allocate resources that would be required to complete your project within the estimated time. The project manager takes care of the execution and provides you with regular updates about the project.

testimonial.name: Our Character Animation Process
testimonial.comment: We then start our character development process, taking into account all your character animation needs with the help of our animation experts and software.

testimonial.name: Our Character Animation Process
testimonial.comment: We then check the project for quality to ensure that the project meets the expectations of our client.

testimonial.name: Our Character Animation Process
testimonial.comment: We deliver the output in the file format as per your preference and send it to you via a secure FTP channel.
